text: <@U1M3199JP>, what's the launcher client? My computer is an virtual machine, so I couldn't use vagrant.   I use "./bin/txnvalidator -vvv  -F mktplace.transactions.market_place --conf-dir ./validator/etc/  --config /home/vagrant/sawtooth/v0.json" to start validator, and use "./bin/mktclient --name mkt --keyfile validator/keys/mkt.wif --conf-dir ./extensions/mktplace/etc/" to start a mktclient.

<@U1M3199JP> Thank you for the suggestion. I have added "InitialConnectivity : 0 " to the validator config file (copied example.js and added the line).
With latest code, when I executed 'launcher' I'm getting error as in below, now.  Am'I missing something here??
"""""""
created genesis block: eeac9e8682c2f2eb
launching validator-0...
validator-0 waiting for registration of 1 validators: .......................................................................................................................................................................................................................... 240.96S 

Failed!
Exiting: 1 extended validators failed to register within 240S.
Sending interrupt signal to validators: : . 0.00S 
Giving validators time to shutdown: : ... 3.01S
"""""""
